meanings.definition: A social gathering of people for pleasure or entertainment.
meanings.sent1: We had a lot of fun at the birthday parties.
meanings.sent2: The neighborhood block parties are always a hit.
meanings.sent3: The parties were so lively that even the shyest guests couldn't resist dancing.
meanings.sent4: The parties were like colorful fireworks lighting up the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The parties were filled with laughter and joy, creating unforgettable memories.

meanings.definition: A group of people who are involved in a particular activity or share a common interest.
meanings.sent1: The political parties had different ideas on how to improve the city.
meanings.sent2: The book club parties meet every month to discuss their latest read.
meanings.sent3: The parties of gamers battled it out in the virtual world.
meanings.sent4: The parties of artists painted a beautiful mural together.
meanings.sent5: The parties of hikers explored the wilderness, united by their love for nature.

meanings.definition: A person or group involved in a legal agreement or dispute.
meanings.sent1: The two parties reached a settlement after months of negotiations.
meanings.sent2: The court case involved multiple parties presenting their arguments.
meanings.sent3: The parties in the lawsuit finally agreed to a compromise.
meanings.sent4: The conflicting parties found common ground and resolved their differences.
meanings.sent5: The parties in the contract signed the agreement, sealing the deal.
